reviews.review_msg: bah! a final exam worth 50% of your grade, and she puts only 10 questions on it. each question is 5% of your final mark! Yikes! and they're not easy either. and one of the questions on it, she covered that topic for the first time that class. Yea she's energetic and knows her stuff, but that's not cool at all.
this lady has too much energy. She knows what she is doing!

this class is a waste. the textbook is confusing. she's passionate about teaching and very energetic, but i dont like her style of teaching. i dont recommend this class unless you're good at thinking "outside the box", if you are, you'll do well
started off where she was funny and charming, now the act gets old. afraid to ask questions now cause she makes some sort of joke out of it or makes you feel dumb

she suck at teaching..her lectures are waste and her marking scheme is stupid.. The materials in the class is very easy but it's not really helpful in real life. I've never had this kind of math teacher before.. very different from others...
